Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of H.R. 4495, the SBA Fraud  Enforcement Extension Act, a companion piece of legislation to S. 1199,  introduced by Senator Ernst.

H.R. 4495 is bipartisan legislation introduced by the gentleman from  Montana (Mr. Downing) and the gentleman from New Jersey (Mr. Conaway).
